import React, {useState, useContext, useEffect} from 'react'; import Layaout from '../components/Layaout/layaout'; import CardPlanta from '../components/cards/cardPlanta' import Link from 'next/link'; //firebase import {FirebaseContext} from '../firebase' // context const state_ini ={ nombre : '', urlImg : '', descripcion :'', masInfo : '', tags : [] } const Medicinales = () => { const [plantas, setPlantas] = useState([]); const {firebase} = useContext(FirebaseContext); useEffect(() => { const obtenerPlantas = () =>{ firebase.db.collection('plantas').orderBy('nombre', 'desc').onSnapshot(manejarSnapShot) } obtenerPlantas(); }, []); function manejarSnapShot (snapshot){ const plantas = snapshot.docs.map(doc => { return { id: doc.id, ...doc.data() }; }); console.log('plantas', plantas); setPlantas(plantas) } return (
